trans-unit.target: TEXT_LUCKZG004_03489_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> Rhil Ril has stumbled upon something rather intriguing.
TEXT_LUCKZG004_03489_TODO_00<tab>Use the rusty spade to dig at the designated location.
TEXT_LUCKZG004_03489_TODO_01<tab>Deliver the rotted chest to Rhil Ril and return his rusty spade.
TEXT_LUCKZG004_03489_RHILRIL_000_000<tab>You must be a traveler, yes? Then maybe you can help me.
TEXT_LUCKZG004_03489_RHILRIL_000_001<tab>I was looking around an abandoned house and I found a map of Amh Araeng, with a big cross drawn on it. It can only mean one thing─treasure!
TEXT_LUCKZG004_03489_RHILRIL_000_002<tab>I want to go and look for it, but I have to stay here and guard the village. Could you go in my stead?
TEXT_LUCKZG004_03489_RHILRIL_000_003<tab>If there are any shinies to be had, we can share them, yes? Here, take my spade and dig where the cross is!
TEXT_LUCKZG004_03489_RHILRIL_000_010<tab>Be sure to bring the treasure to me, along with my spade! You do not want to know what happens to thieves around here...
TEXT_LUCKZG004_03489_SYSTEM_000_020<tab>You discover a rotted chest buried in the soil.
TEXT_LUCKZG004_03489_RHILRIL_000_030<tab>Show me what you found! Show me! And give me my spade back, please!
TEXT_LUCKZG004_03489_RHILRIL_000_031<tab>Oh, this must be very old... Let us see what is inside...
TEXT_LUCKZG004_03489_RHILRIL_000_032<tab>What!? Nothing but junk! Rusty junk, at that! Why would anyone bury this? Wait, is that a diary? I am sure the former owner will not mind if I take a peek...
TEXT_LUCKZG004_03489_RHILRIL_000_033<tab>Hmm... It looks like the owner had to leave Amh Araeng but was planning to come back one day.
TEXT_LUCKZG004_03489_RHILRIL_000_034<tab>And if that day ever came, they wanted to dig up the diary and continue writing their life story.

TEXT_LUCKZG004_03489_RHILRIL_000_035<tab>I wonder if that person is still alive... Probably not, judging by the state of this chest. It must have been buried for a long time. Maybe their children, or their children's children will come in search of it.

TEXT_LUCKZG004_03489_RHILRIL_000_036<tab>If I read the rest, maybe I can learn who this person was... And then I will put it back, in a more sturdy box. And since there was no treasure to share, I will give you this instead as payment for your hard work!
